description: Cheer on our finalists at the Los Alamitos Spelling Bee.

name: Bubblefest
description: Bubblefest takes place in the cafeteria. Volunteers are needed for set up and clean up.

name: Galentine's Night Out
description: 45 minutes of strength training work out followed by bubbles at F45 Branham Park.

name: Yearbook Cover Contest
description: Los Alamitos PTA is inviting all Los Alamitos 5th graders to enter their drawings for the Yearbook cover contest. 2 winners will be selected.

name: Variety Show
description: Volunteers are needed for MCs, stage hands, AV support, and concession organization. Students can sign up to perform.

name: Math Kangaroo Competition
description: Math competition for students. Registration code: CASAN_J0017001@2026math

name: Reading Lab Volunteers Needed
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who need extra help with reading skills. Volunteers are needed one day per week (Tuesday, Wednesday, or Thursday).

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025-26 yearbook. 5th grade parents need to submit baby photos by March 1st.

name: Four Seasons Fundraising Concert
description: The Castillero Middle School Orchestras will be performing a concert featuring guest artist Mads Tolling. Proceeds will support the music program.

name: Author Assembly - Shawn Harris
description: The PTA is hosting author Shawn Harris for an assembly about his new book "Let's Be Bees". Book orders are due by January 19th.
